languages.text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
languages.original_text: Дает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}. Также каждый случай нанесения и получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} повышает шанс критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} персонажа на 10%. Эффект действует 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, после чего персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Grants +15 bonus to STR for 2 rounds, but in the next round the user becomes staggered.
Any instance of damage dealt or suffered during that time grants +20% critical hit chance.

Grants a +15 bonus to STR for 2 rounds but causes the user to become staggered in the next round.
Any instance of damage dealt or suffered during that time grants +20% critical hit chance.

Grants a +15 bonus to STR for 2 rounds but causes the user to become staggered in the next round.
Any instance of damage dealt or suffered during that time grants +20% critical hit chance.

Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

languages.text: Дает +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}. Также каждый случай нанесения и получения {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} повышает шанс критического {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} персонажа на 10%. Эффект действует 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}, после чего персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +15 к Силе на 2 раунда, но на время следующего раунда накладывает эффект ошеломления.
Также дает +20% к шансу критического попадания для совершаемых и получаемых атак на все время действия.

Дает +15 к Силе на 2 раунда, но на время следующего раунда накладывает эффект ошеломления.
Также дает +20% к шансу критического попадания для совершаемых и получаемых атак на все время действия.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高15点，每当使用者造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}或受到伤害时，都会使使用者的暴击率提高10%。此效果持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}，效果结束后，使用者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高15点，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}，但使用者在接下来的一轮中会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
药效持续期间，受到的所有攻击，造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}暴击{/g}的几率都会提高20%。

languages.text: Proporciona +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. Además, el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que inflige y que sufre el usuario aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} crítico un +10 % cada vez que se produce. Este efecto dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}, dejando {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} al usuario al terminar.
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} +15 a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g} pero el usuario queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} en el siguiente asalto.
Cualquier daño infligido o sufrido durante este período tiene una bonificación de +20 % a la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.

languages.text: +15の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}を付与して、使用者の被ダメージと与ダメージどちらであっても、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が起きるたびに使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}クリティカルヒット率{/g}が10%増加する。この効果は2{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}持続して、効果が切れると使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態になる。
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}に+15の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与えるが、使用者は次のラウンドの間{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態になる。
その間に与えた、または受けたダメージは、{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}クリティカルヒット率{/g} +20%。

languages.text: Gewährt +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und jeder erlittene oder verursachte {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} des Nutzers erhöht seine kritische {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} pro Schaden um +10 %. Dieser Effekt hält 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} lang an belegt den Nutzer danach mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Gewährt +15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}, doch der Benutzer {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}taumelt{/g} in der nächsten Runde.
Jeder während dieser Zeit erlittene oder zugefügte Schaden gewährt +20% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}Kritischer-Treffer-Chance{/g}.

languages.text: Confère +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, et tous les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} infligés ou subis par l'utilisateur augmentent les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de coup{/g} critique de celui-ci de +10 % par instance de dégâts. Cet effet dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, après quoi l'utilisateur subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Confère un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FOR{/g} de +15 pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}, mais inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à l'utilisateur au round suivant.
Chaque instance de dégâts infligés ou subis durant ce laps de temps confère +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamage}chances d'infliger un coup critique{/g}.

languages.text: +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazandırır ve kullanıcının verdiği veya aldığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarlar{/g}, kullanıcının kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığını{/g} her hasar silsilesi için +%10 artırır. Bu etki 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} sürer ve sonrasında kullanıcı {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallar{/g}.
languages.original_text: Grants +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and all {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} both dealt or suffered by the user increases the user's critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} by +10% for each instance of damage. This effect lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, after that the user becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
